title: Tim Gettys Proposal To Gia
description:
Please share this video with your friends on Facebook and Twitter and click the like button!

Tim finally proposed to Gia. Did she say yes?

Thank you to Ocean Ale House for having us!
http://www.oceanalehouse.com/

Shot by Kevin Coello and Jason Getchell

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: so Gia and I have had an amazing four years together falling in love kissing while crowds surfing and watching The Bachelor every Monday I decided it was finally time for us to become a family like in the Fast and the Furious so I told her mom it was about to go down G and I are both very proud San Francisco natives but I have never been to Alcatraz despite it being her favorite place in the world so we headed over started the audio tour but about 25 minutes in this happened on June 12th 1962 associate Warden Arthur dollson was in charge while Warden Blackwell was away on a two we fishing vacation so pretty okay hello hey Gia I hope you're having fun on Alcatraz so far my first time's going great look at us we're just a little Alcatraz fan yeah this is happening to say it was love at first sight would be a slight exaggeration but love at first text now that's real I wasn't looking for you honestly I didn't know you were something I could look for it didn't feel fair to ask for you the

sight would be a slight exaggeration but love at first text now that's real I wasn't looking for you honestly I didn't know you were something I could look for it didn't feel fair to ask for you the support the depth the partnership the opportunities to learn not just about myself but about others as well it's the willingness to question yourself and push me to do the same it's the back and forth It's the lack of Silence that's not in the movies the love songs don't mention that part for the rest of our lives we will have [ __ ] to shoot all right you can take out the earphones now oh my God G four years ago we drove down to LA and we talked the entire time in the car and that conversation still hasn't stopped I found my favorite me and you and I hope that that conversation never stops so I wanted to ask you will you accept this Rose and will you marry me oh my God I love you oh my God is pretty dope I don't know how I don't know that work you can take this oh my God wait you're just

I wanted to ask you will you accept this Rose and will you marry me oh my God I love you oh my God is pretty dope I don't know how I don't know that work you can take this oh my God wait you're just okay oh it's beautiful oh my thank you guys oh man what's up Cel how you doing man thank you very I was so scared to turn around when I saw you did see him right there I saw a guy I didn't know even just now I just realized oh my God yeah like I saw you guys like I heard you obviously [Laughter] but I love you oh my God oh my God I heard your voice I was like I didn't even think that's what it was I was like he would do that oh it's so funny I don't have the rest of the tour I'm sorry are you kidding you don't I don't no no wait you're serious yeah I had to edit it the whole file I don't know I didn't think that far I was really stressed this whole time I love you I love you oh damn all right we can cut then we had an amazing dinner at Epic Steakhouse and Gia called a few of her loved ones

didn't think that far I was really stressed this whole time I love you I love you oh damn all right we can cut then we had an amazing dinner at Epic Steakhouse and Gia called a few of her loved ones to break the news and have the little moment including two of her best friends that live in LA after that we headed over to my brother's birthday party but when we got there she realized it was actually a surprise engagement party with all of our friends and family including her two best friends who flew in from LA [Applause] [Music] [Music] I am a very lucky man love
